text: Jeremy Zuckerman is an American composer and musician. He has studied at Berklee College of Music, Boston, and California Institute of the Arts. He is mostly known for composing the score of Avatar: The Last Airbender. He has also collaborated with David Lee Roth. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Interview with the Track Team at Soundtrack.net * Interview with the Track Team at AvatarSpirit.Net * Interview With Jeremy Zuckerman Composer of Avatar The Last Airbender Soundtrack at AvatarTheLastAirbenderOnline.com Category:Living people Category:Emmy Award winners Category:1975 births Category:21st-century American composers Category:American composers Category:Avatar: The Last Airbender Category:Musicians from New York (state) Category:People from Newburgh, New York Category:Writers from New York (state)
title: Jeremy Zuckerman
